values: 补丁；斑点；色斑；碎片；一段时间；临时修补；膏药；（计算机）补丁程序；眼罩；小区域；小块土地；小块种植区；一段（艰难）岁月
修补；缝补；补缀；修复；修正；改善；打补丁；更新软件；改错

synonym.mean: 眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 不调和的；拼凑成的；有补丁的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多用于美语，仅用于指带有安装固定性质的修理。
通常指较简单的修复过程，一般不需要专门技术或特殊工具。
可与mend换用，但一般指需要较高的职业技能和使用较复杂的工具进行修理。
通常指用类似材料修补破洞、裂缝或磨损的地方。

word_group.brief_definition: 斑片试验；斑贴试验；皮肤接触试验

bilingual.source: There is a patch on my pants.
bilingual.target: 我的裤子上有一个补丁。

bilingual.source: The patch was sewn onto the jacket.
He fixed the tire with a patch.
bilingual.target: 他用一个补丁修好了轮胎。

bilingual.source: There is a patch on his pants.
bilingual.target: 他的裤子上有一个补丁小块。
这个软件需要一个新的补丁。

bilingual.source: He wore an eye patch after the surgery.
bilingual.target: 手术后他戴了一个眼补丁。

bilingual.source: There is a colorful patch on her dress.
bilingual.target: 她的衣服上有一个彩色的补丁。

bilingual.source: We planted a strawberry patch in the garden.
bilingual.target: 我们在花园里种了一个草莓补丁。

bilingual.source: The software update includes a security patch.
bilingual.target: 这个软件更新包含一个安全补丁。

bilingual.source: He used a patch to fix the hole in his jeans.
bilingual.target: 他用一个补丁修补了牛仔裤上的洞。

list.abstract: Patch多指补丁的意思，比如内存补丁、文件补丁等，也是电脑命令程序的一种。主要是对文件应用更改。

yingyinNormal.en: He said, "never patch." do you even listen?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说了"永远别补" 你不听人说话的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Sometimes you can't patch a tire. You just got to buy a new one. Actually, that's always the case. Never patch, buy new.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有些轮胎是补不了的。你只能买新的换。其实永远都是这样。永远别补，汰旧换新。

yingyinNormal.en: I wouldn't miss it. Is it me, or did we just patch a tire?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会错过的。是我错觉，还是我们补好了一个轮胎？

yingyinNormal.en: Like when that Sparkletts guy let me look under his eye patch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像那个独眼龙揭了眼罩让我看。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I was thinking. Take the clothes off Joey's Cabbage Patch Kid!
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我想想把乔伊的菜地娃的衣服扒了！

yingyinNormal.en: What? You love her. She loves you. It's just a rough patch, that's all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？你爱她，她爱你，这只是个小矛盾，仅此而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Director Green, perhaps it's better I patch you into the whole room. One second.
yingyinNormal.zh: 格林处长，我最好还是把你接到免提上。请稍等。

yingyinNormal.en: Launched in 2009, Kepler stared at one small patch of the Milky Way for four years straight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开普勒于2009年发射，连续盯着一小块银河系盯了四年。

yingyinNormal.en: Places everybody. The judges are coming. I'm ready. Joseph's ready. Cabbage Patch Christ is ready.
yingyinNormal.zh: 各就各位，裁判要来了，我准备好了，约瑟夫好了，椰菜娃娃版耶稣也准备好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Grampy Rabbit is measuring the hole in Grandpa Pig's boat. Now, I need to find something to patch it up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 兔爷爷在用尺来量猪爷爷船上破洞的大小。现在，我要找些东西把这个洞补起来。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, I have Phoebe Buffay returning a page. Okay, well, she's in her car. I'll have to patch you through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比布菲要回覆呼叫，好，她在车上，我帮你接过去。

yingyinNormal.en: Howard, your scooter's blocking my car. Aw, did you get pinkeye again? Step one: she notices the eye patch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，你的小摩托挡住我的车了，啊呀，你又得红眼病了？首先，她注意到我的眼罩了。

yingyinNormal.en: If we don't patch it up, the propulsion tank will overflow and flood the ship with poisonous gas! This? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们不把漏气的地方补上，毒气会从气箱里漫出来，有毒气体会充满整艘飞船！这个？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Busted! Come on, you guys. What are you doing? I thought we were the Patch Sisters. Yeah. That didn't work out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 被逮到了。你们这是在干嘛？我们不是戒烟姐妹花吗？对，那样行不通。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry to interrupt. You two enjoy your date. Here's a dollar for your troubles. Get yourself some Sour Patch Kids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉打扰你们了，祝两位约会愉快。给你一块钱就当我给你添麻烦了，自己去买点酸软糖吃吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. I turned to talk to you in class to tell you about this little dry patch and realized I was talking to Yogi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是，我转身跟你说我手上这块皮肤好干然后才意识到我是在跟尤吉说。

yingyinNormal.en: Unfortunately though, I still can't patch you through dispatch. She's probably on her way to Margot's vigil, though.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的很不巧，通过调度中心也不能帮你接通。她也许正在去玛戈的守夜礼上。

yingyinNormal.en: For nearly 60 years, this humble patch of earth on the outskirts of town has been transformed into a frozen fantasy land.
yingyinNormal.zh: 近60年来，哈尔滨郊外这块不起眼的土地变身成为一块冰封的梦幻世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, boys. Ahoy, matey. Noticed the eye patch, did you? It's all part of a technique I've been studying for picking up women.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子们好。这位兄台好。注意到我的眼罩了是吗？这是一个我最近正在研究的勾搭女人的新技术。

yingyinNormal.en: It's only a patch of mud. Come on, Gertrude. You can make it. Come on, bus. You can make it. The bus is stuck in the mud. Oh bother.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这只是一滩泥而已。来吧，格特鲁德，你可以过去的！来吧，巴士，你也可以的！巴士陷进了泥里去了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意思为“补缀”，指用一块材料填放于裂缝或破损处。
指将受损、出故障或用旧的东西修理好。
指将打破、撕碎、穿破、用坏的东西修补完整。

修补; 缝补; 补丁

examination_example.sentence: It looks like what's at issue is much more how contaminated with bacteria that <highlight>patch</highlight> of floor happens to be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看起来问题更多的是在于那块地板被细菌污染的程度。

examination_example.sentence: People in both groups used nicotine (尼古丁) <highlight>patches</highlight> before they quit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两组人在戒烟前都使用了尼古丁贴片。

examination_example.sentence: Tom Moses noticed a "brown <highlight>patch</highlight>" on the back of the car after the owner parked it to do some shopping.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在车主把车停好去购物后，汤姆·摩西注意到车后面有一块“棕色的斑点”。

examination_example.sentence: In the film(called <highlight>Patch</highlight> Adams), Robin Williams played Adams.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在电影（名为帕奇·亚当斯）中，罗宾·威廉姆斯扮演亚当斯。
